metadata.title: CVE-2016-9828 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The dumpBuffer function in read.c in the listswf tool in libming 0.4.7allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference) via a crafted SWF file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
